programme.title: Into the Ashes
programme.desc: Nick is an ex-con who's adjusting to a new job, a new wife and some semblance of normalcy in rural Alabama. When vengeful former associates track him down, he's soon forced back into the desperate and violent life that he thought he left behind.

programme.title: Way of the Wicked
programme.desc: When a town is swept by a series of gruesome killings, a mysterious priest (Christian Slater) seems to be the only one who can help protect them from a truth more evil than any of them could have imagined.

programme.title: Adulterers
programme.desc: A husband comes home early on his wedding anniversary and finds his wife in bed with another man. The lovers quickly learn how far a jealous husband will go when uncontrollable passions erupt.

programme.title: Terminal
programme.desc: Murderous consequences unravel in the dead of night as the lives of two assassins, a teacher, a janitor and a waitress intertwine at the hands of a mysterious criminal mastermind who's out for revenge.

programme.title: Always and Forever
programme.desc: When a woman's childhood friends begin to die under mysterious circumstances, she becomes convinced their deaths are tied to dark secrets from her past.

programme.title: Surveillance
programme.desc: A seemingly normal security guard (Armand Assante) reveals a sinister side.

programme.title: The Tall Man
programme.desc: A nurse's (Jessica Biel) young son is the latest victim in a series of small-town child abductions rumored to be orchestrated by an ominous figure known as "the Tall Man."

programme.title: 24 Exposures
programme.desc: A fetish photographer and a homicide detective develop an unlikely friendship as they probe the murder of a model.

programme.title: Apartment 4E
programme.desc: Trapped in a dark world of her own making, Piper (Nicole Beharie) has not left her apartment in a long time. A knock on her door reveals a stranger who may have answers to the mystery at the center of her world.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A man and his pregnant wife become trapped in their car when a storm buries them underneath layers of snow and ice. As supplies dwindle and temperatures plunge, the couple must battle the elements and hypothermia in a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Radioflash
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, a tech-savvy teenager and her father flee the city and seek refuge with her grandfather deep in the mountains of the Pacific Northwest.

programme.title: The Beta Test
programme.desc: A married Hollywood agent receives a mysterious letter for an anonymous sexual encounter and becomes ensnared in a sinister world of lying, murder and infidelity.

programme.title: Narcopolis
programme.desc: In the near future, Frank, a police officer, discovers that the legalization of all recreational drugs comes with a price.

programme.title: A Lonely Place to Die
programme.desc: Five mountaineers stumble into a vicious kidnapping scheme after they rescue a child they find buried alive in the Scottish Highlands.
